title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip install ollama to chat with local models from Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; npm install ollama to use local LLMs in Node or browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama; drop-in replacement for OpenAI in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI); Docker one-liner to get a ChatGPT-like interface.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven Central artifact to integrate local LLMs in JVM apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with chat history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a free local GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + ChromaDB to chat with private documents.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Clean Next.js chatbot template that consumes the Ollama OpenAI-compatible endpoint.

title: ollama-nvidia-docker
summary: Official container images with CUDA runtime for GPU-accelerated inference.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app + REST API that wraps Ollama for multi-user chat inside PostgreSQL.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside notes using Ollama.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt bot that answers questions via Ollama models without leaving Slack.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration to use Ollama generators and embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Lightweight Discord.py bot that streams Ollama responses into Discord threads.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated collection of Modelfiles for Llama 3, Phi-3, CodeLlama, Mistral, Gemma, etc.
